about_the_game:
Taichin XI, one of the moons of the planet Teptes is rich in rare earth elements but is also home to the hostile alien race. Your mining operations have disturbed the local fauna and now they are coming for your colony.

Arm your troops with powerful weapons and get ready for the final showdown. Unlock advanced weaponry, upgrade your units, and build crucial facilities to support your squads as you prepare for your last stand against relentless hordes of enemies.

Build tech plants and unlock powerful end game units to deal with the toughest of the horde.

Rampart Defense is a classic Idle tower defense game where the player deploys various troops and vehicles to defend his colony from the attacking alien hordes.

The player needs to build support structures to support your troops.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Squad based.
  • Various weapons to choose from. Each squad member can equip a different weapon.
  • Research and Unlock New Stuff.
  • Build various support buildings.
  • Carry your left over resources to next game.
  • Various Vehicles including heavy tanks and mec troopers.
  • Defend against ground and air enemies.


About the Game

Taichin XI, one of the moons of the planet Teptes is rich in rare earth elements but is also home to the hostile alien race. Your mining operations have disturbed the local fauna and now they are coming for your colony.

Arm your troops with powerful weapons and get ready for the final showdown. Unlock advanced weaponry, upgrade your units, and build crucial facilities to support your squads as you prepare for your last stand against relentless hordes of enemies.

Build tech plants and unlock powerful end game units to deal with the toughest of the horde.

Rampart Defense is a classic Idle tower defense game where the player deploys various troops and vehicles to defend his colony from the attacking alien hordes.

The player needs to build support structures to support your troops.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Rampart Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Rampart Defense is a classic tower defense game where you strategically deploy troops and vehicles to protect your colony from waves of enemies.
